items.name: Finca Aventuras PJ
items.short_description: A working family farm offering interactive tours where kids can feed animals, milk cows, and learn about tropical agriculture.
items.address: Calle Central, Barrio La Palma, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Corcovado Mini-Farm
items.short_description: A charming petting zoo and garden focused on local farm animals and organic farming practices, perfect for toddlers and young children.
items.address: 200m Este del Parque Central, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: La Ceiba Ranch Kids
items.short_description: Experience life on a tropical ranch with pony rides, a small petting area, and a fun scavenger hunt through the fruit orchards.
items.address: Ruta 245, Kilómetro 3, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Tropical Harvest Fun
items.short_description: A hands-on experience where kids can help harvest seasonal crops, make fresh fruit juices, and interact with farm animals.
items.address: Vía Dos Brazos, Finca La Esperanza, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Estrella Corcovado Dome
items.short_description: A portable inflatable planetarium dome offering captivating shows about the stars, planets, and constellations visible from the Southern Osa Peninsula.
items.address: Centro Comunal de Puerto Jiménez, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Osa Sky Gazer
items.short_description: An interactive outdoor astronomy experience with telescopes and guided storytelling about local constellations and celestial myths.
items.address: Mirador de Osa, Playa Platanares, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Jungle Star Lab
items.short_description: A small, dedicated room with projection technology and interactive displays teaching kids about the solar system and space exploration in a jungle theme.
items.address: Eco-Lodge El Remanso, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Cosmic Canopy Show
items.short_description: A unique nocturnal experience combining a guided night walk through the canopy with laser projections of constellations and celestial bodies on the trees.
items.address: Reserva Natural Cacao, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Osa Jungle Splash
items.short_description: A natural water play area with small, safe pools fed by a gentle stream, mini-slides, and a sandy beach for digging and building.
items.address: Río Tigre, Sector La Laguna, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Río Tigre Wet Fun
items.short_description: Offers guided tubing adventures on a calm stretch of the Río Tigre, suitable for families with young children, focusing on gentle floats and water games.
items.address: Entrada Río Tigre, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Golfo Dulce Waterslides
items.short_description: A small, charming area featuring inflatable slides and a shallow splash zone right on the edge of Golfo Dulce, perfect for cooling off.
items.address: Playa Platanares, al lado del muelle, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Corcovado Aqua Adventure
items.short_description: An eco-friendly splash park with interactive water features, spray jets, and a mini-waterfall, designed for safe and refreshing fun in the tropical heat.
items.address: Carretera a Matapalo, Sector Dos Brazos, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: PJ Jungle Puppet Show
items.short_description: A local puppet theater featuring handcrafted puppets telling engaging stories inspired by Costa Rican folklore and the wildlife of the Osa Peninsula.
items.address: Centro Cultural de Puerto Jiménez, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Osa Circo Fantástico
items.short_description: A small-scale, vibrant circus show with local acrobats, jugglers, and clowns performing family-friendly acts under a colorful tent.
items.address: Campo Ferial, Calle Real, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Magic Macaw Theater
items.short_description: A delightful puppet show and interactive storytelling session focused on conservation messages, featuring charismatic macaw and monkey puppets.
items.address: Parque Nacional Corcovado Visitor Center, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: El Tucán Marionettes
items.short_description: An intimate marionette show bringing to life classic tales and new adventures with beautifully crafted wooden puppets, often followed by a puppet-making workshop.
items.address: Cafetería La Casita, Calle del Sol, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Corcovado Canopy Kids
items.short_description: A scaled-down adventure park designed for young explorers, featuring low ropes courses, a mini-zipline, and safe climbing structures amidst the trees.
items.address: Carretera a Dos Brazos, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Playground del Sol
items.short_description: A modern and well-maintained public playground with swings, slides, climbing frames, and a dedicated area for toddlers, shaded by tropical trees.
items.address: Parque Central de Puerto Jiménez, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Jungle Explorer Park
items.short_description: An imaginative adventure park where kids navigate obstacle courses, build forts, and explore themed play zones designed to spark creativity.
items.address: Barrio El Centro, al lado del hotel, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Osa Adventure Quest
items.short_description: A unique play area featuring natural elements like log bridges, rock climbs, and a 'secret' jungle trail, promoting physical activity and discovery.
items.address: Playa Tamales, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Osa Treasure Hunt
items.short_description: An exciting, guided treasure hunt through the rainforest, combining clues, puzzles, and nature observations to find hidden 'gold' (a souvenir prize).
items.address: Oficina de Aventuras Osa, Calle Principal, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Corcovado Nature Quest
items.short_description: An educational scavenger hunt focused on identifying local plants and animals, with a field guide and nature bingo cards for kids.
items.address: Sendero El Ceibo, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Pizote's Puzzle Path
items.short_description: A series of engaging riddles and physical challenges set along a winding forest path, leading participants to a final 'secret' location.
items.address: Hacienda Bambú, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Hidden Waterfall Challenge
items.short_description: A guided adventure hike where kids follow clues to discover a beautiful hidden waterfall, learning about jungle survival skills along the way.
items.address: Entrada al Sendero Cascada Escondida, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Osa Wildlife Kids Rescue
items.short_description: A small wildlife rescue center where children can learn about and observe rescued animals like sloths, monkeys, and birds, focusing on rehabilitation and release.
items.address: Carretera a Carate, Kilómetro 5, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Jungle Friends Petting Zoo
items.short_description: A friendly petting zoo featuring domesticated animals and some rescued local species, offering hands-on interaction and feeding opportunities.
items.address: Barrio La Ceiba, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Sloth Sanctuary & Play
items.short_description: A small, ethical sanctuary dedicated to sloths, offering observation areas and educational programs, plus a sloth-themed playground.
items.address: Sendero del Perezoso, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Macaw & Monkey Meet
items.short_description: An ethically managed encounter program allowing children to safely observe and learn about the local macaws and monkeys in a semi-wild setting.
items.address: Finca La Golondrina, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Osa EcoKids Lab
items.short_description: A hands-on discovery center focused on the ecology and biodiversity of the Osa Peninsula, with interactive exhibits for young scientists.
items.address: Antiguo Edificio Municipal, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Corcovado Discovery Center
items.short_description: An engaging children's museum exploring the flora, fauna, and indigenous cultures of Corcovado National Park through play and learning zones.
items.address: Avenida 1, frente al Parque, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: PJ Little Explorers House
items.short_description: A creative play space designed to resemble a traditional Costa Rican home, encouraging imaginative role-play and cultural learning for preschoolers.
items.address: Barrio El Progreso, Calle La Paz, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Tropical Nature Kids Museum
items.short_description: A sensory-rich museum where children can touch, smell, and hear the sounds of the rainforest, with exhibits on insects, plants, and local ecosystems.
items.address: Reserva Biológica Esquinas, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Golfo Dulce Mini-Aqua
items.short_description: A compact aquarium showcasing the vibrant marine life of Golfo Dulce, including colorful reef fish, seahorses, and local crustaceans in small tanks.
items.address: Muelle de Puerto Jiménez, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Mangrove Marine Lab
items.short_description: An educational exhibit focused on the unique ecosystem of the mangrove forests, featuring a touch tank with crabs, juvenile fish, and other estuary inhabitants.
items.address: Sendero de Manglares, Playa Platanares, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Osa Ocean Discoveries
items.short_description: A small visitor center with interactive displays and observation tanks, highlighting marine conservation efforts and the diverse creatures of the Pacific Ocean.
items.address: Centro de Investigaciones Marinas Osa, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Coral Kids Corner
items.short_description: A dedicated section within a dive shop, offering colorful coral reef models, small tanks with local tropical fish, and educational videos for children.
items.address: Tienda de Buceo, Calle del Mar, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Dinosaurios de la Osa
items.short_description: A compact outdoor exhibit featuring life-sized dinosaur replicas hidden among the tropical foliage, with interpretive signs about prehistoric times.
items.address: Sector La Cascada, Carretera a Matapalo, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Prehistoric Jungle Play
items.short_description: A dinosaur-themed playground with climbing structures, fossil digging pits, and a 'volcano' slide, designed for active imaginative play.
items.address: Área Recreativa Municipal, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: T-Rex Trail Fun
items.short_description: A short, engaging walking trail through a forested area featuring smaller dinosaur models, sound effects, and discovery challenges for kids.
items.address: Sendero Las Pizotes, Puerto Jiménez

items.name: Raptor Ridge Adventure
items.short_description: An adventurous play zone with climbing walls and ropes themed around raptors and other agile dinosaurs, encouraging physical activity and creative exploration.
items.address: Parque de Aventura Sol y Selva, Puerto Jiménez
